title: [solved]820-2879 solved thank you
message: hi friends I just want to thank you because today I solve all by myself a board with a issue on the one wire circuit , one of the paths on u6901 was corroded I just run a jumper wire to L6995 and that was it , machine works with no backlight , fuse was bad  I replace it and done. :)

title: [solved]820-2879 solved thank you
message: That is a very long wire for this purpose,but good work all the same! It is called onewire, not oneshortwire, so you're good. :)
